feed.title: Modify Watches: New Products - Zebra
feed.subtitle: A list of the new products at Modify Watches.

entry.title: Fruitstripes Gum
entry.content:
The 'Fruitstripes Gum' comes with one Zebra watch face and one Orchid strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scratch-res..

Price: $50.00
